rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I've got a big brother called Elnoth,
and he became a Driver!

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0002
rows.name:
And guess what? He got into the
Superbian army!

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Umm... What weapon did his Blade
have again...? Nnnggh...

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0004
rows.name:
If it was a Greataxe or a Megalance,
he could smack the bad guys super
easily...

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0005
rows.name:
But it's dangerous too, 'cos if you
deal that much damage all at once,
they'll get really angry at you.

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0006
rows.name:
If it was a Bitball, he'd be able to
heal injured teammates. Bitballs
are good at doing that.

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0007
rows.name:
If he's got teammates with a Shield
Hammer or a Chroma Katana, though,
he needs to pay attention to their HP!

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0008
rows.name:
See, I know stuff! That's 'cos
me and Elnoth studied together!
